com.wm.app.b2b.client

Class JSONClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wm.app.b2b.client.BaseContext
      • com.wm.app.b2b.client.Context
        • com.wm.app.b2b.client.JSONClient

  • public class JSONClient
extends Context
    Extends Context with invoke and invokeThreaded methods that accept JSON text. The character encoding used when serializing and deserializing the JSON text defaults to "UTF-8". Call the setEncoding(JSON_ENCODING) method prior to calling the invoke or invokeThreaded methods to use a different encoding.

    Note: JSONClient requires that the SoftwareAG_directory/common/lib/glassfish/gf-jackson-core-asl.jar is present in the classpath. Without gf-jackson-core-asl.jar, JSONClient cannot parse JSON responses.

    • Constructor Detail

      • JSONClient

    • Method Detail

      • setEncoding

        public void setEncoding(IDataJSONCoder.JSON_ENCODING encoding)
        Sets the character encoding used when serializing and deserializing the JSON text. Defaults to "UTF-8". To use a different character set, call this method prior to calling an invoke method.
        Parameters:
        encoding - The possible values are:
        • JSON_ENCODING.UTF8 - UTF-8
        • JSON_ENCODING.UTF16_BE - UTF-16 big endian
        • JSON_ENCODING.UTF16_LE - UTF-16 little endian
        • JSON_ENCODING.UTF32_BE - UTF-32 big endian
        • JSON_ENCODING.UTF32_LE - UTF-32 little endian

      • getEncoding

        public IDataJSONCoder.JSON_ENCODING getEncoding()
        Returns:
        The character encoding in use. See #setEncoding(JSON_ENCODING).

      • invoke

        public java.lang.String invoke(java.lang.String ifc,
                               java.lang.String svc,
                               java.lang.String jsonData)
                        throws ServiceException
        Invokes a service on an Integration Server. Prior to calling this method, use one of the connect methods to connect to an Integration Server.
        Parameters:
        ifc - The interface of the service to invoke.
        svc - The name of the service to invoke.
        jsonData - A string holding JSON text containing the input to the service being invoked.
        Returns:
        A string holding JSON text containing the output from the invoked service.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - If this JSONClient is not connected to an Integration Server or if the server threw an Exception while processing this request.

      • invokeThreaded

        public InvokeThread invokeThreaded(NSName svcName,
                                   java.lang.String jsonData)
        Calls invoke asynchronously and returns an InvokeThread. The getJSONData method can then be called on the returned InvokeThread to retrieve the results of the service invocation.
        Parameters:
        svcName - namespace name of the service to invoke
        jsonData - input data for the service
        Returns:
        an InvokeThread. Call InvokeThread#getJSONData() to get the results of the service invocation.
        See Also:
        #invoke(String, String, String)}

      • invokeThreaded

        public InvokeThread invokeThreaded(java.lang.String ifc,
                                   java.lang.String svc,
                                   java.lang.String jsonData)
        Calls invoke asynchronously and returns an InvokeThread. The getJSONData method can then be called on the returned InvokeThread to retrieve the results of the service invocation.
        Parameters:
        ifc - interface name of the service to invoke
        svc - service to invoke
        jsonData - input data for the service
        Returns:
        an InvokeThread. Call InvokeThread#getJSONData() to get the results of the service invocation.
        See Also:
        #invoke(String, String, String)}
